schemacrawler.tools.text.utility

Interface TextFormattingHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HtmlFormattingHelper, PlainTextFormattingHelper

    public interface TextFormattingHelper
    Methods to format entire rows of output.
    Author:
    Sualeh Fatehi

      • writeDetailRow

        void writeDetailRow(String text1,
                    String text2,
                    String text3,
                    boolean escapeText,
                    boolean emphasize,
                    String style)
        Creates a detail row, with four fields. The name can be emphasized.
        Parameters:
        text1 - Text for field 1
        text2 - Text for field 2
        text3 - Text for field 3
        escapeText - Escape sequence
        emphasize - Whether to emphasize text
        style - Other CSS style
